nodes.text: This being was a biologist serving in the Imperial Science Bureau of the reconstituted Sith Empire and the adoptive father of Veradun (later known as Darth Malgus). After Veradun killed one of his Twi'lek servants, his adoptive father proudly sent him to the Sith Academy on Dromund Kaas for training in the ways of the Sith. As a result of this training, Veradun became Darth Malgus, a Sith Lord of the Empire. He appeared to be a supporter of the Empire's works, and his personal zoo was funded by the Empire.
